## Programme
### 1956
Programme for the BBC's 'Light Programme' music festival of 1956. George Swift is listed as being one of just four soloists in the orchestra. The programme is a 16 page booklet which includes an illustration of a red brass instrument on the front cover, with the red and white text on a black background. The original price was one shilling and sixpence. The programme includes a photograph and brief biography of George Swift on page 13.
